name: Get Pivot Search Results
description: Discover related domains by pivoting on infrastructure connections through DomainTools Iris Investigate API. Search across domains, IP addresses, emails, nameservers, and other indicators to identify associated infrastructure for threat hunting and investigation

query_value.description: The value to search for (e.g., domain name, IP address, email address, nameserver hostname)

pivot_type.description: The infrastructure indicator type to pivot on (e.g., 'domain', 'ip', 'email', 'nameserver_host')

limit_exceeded.description: Indicates if the API response limit per page has been exceeded

has_more_results.description: Indicates if additional results are available beyond the current response

message.description: Status message from DomainTools API (e.g., 'Enjoy your data.')

results_count.description: Number of related domains found in the current response

total_count.description: Total number of related domains matching the pivot query

results.description: Array of domains connected to the queried indicator through shared infrastructure (IP, email, nameserver, etc.)

missing_domains.description: Array of domain names that were queried but not found in the DomainTools database
